member.name: NET_IF_DIRECTION_TYPE
member.summary: The NET_IF_ACCESS_TYPE enumeration type specifies theNDIS network interface direction type.

member.name: NET_IF_DIRECTION_TYPE.NET_IF_DIRECTION_SENDRECEIVE
member.summary: Indicates the send and receive direction type. This direction type indicates that the NDIS network interface can send and receive data.

member.name: NET_IF_DIRECTION_TYPE.NET_IF_DIRECTION_SENDONLY
member.summary: Indicates the send only direction type. This direction type indicates that the NDIS network interface can only send data.

member.name: NET_IF_DIRECTION_TYPE.NET_IF_DIRECTION_RECEIVEONLY
member.summary: Indicates the receive only direction type. This direction type indicates that the NDIS network interface can only receive data.

member.name: NET_IF_DIRECTION_TYPE.NET_IF_DIRECTION_MAXIMUM
member.summary: A maximum value for testing purposes.
